Containers.Description: [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Description[/span][/u][/b][br] FlexGet is a program aimed to automate downloading or processing content (torrents, podcasts, etc.) from different sources like RSS-feeds, html-pages, various sites and more.[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] This is where flexget will store it's configuration file, database and logs.[br] [b]/data[/b] This path is used retrieve the downloaded files by your downloader application.[br] [b]/media[/b] This is where flexget will scan for media files.[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Notes[/span][/u][/b][br] Please configure flexget via the flexget.yml file located in your defined /config path from the above run command.[br][br]
